post.description: Endpoint to get registered domains from DNSTwist.

get.description: Endpoint to list all available connectors. It processes each connector to verify the connection and returns the results.

200.description: A JSON response containing the list of all available connectors along with their connection verification status.

get.summary: Get the details of a specific connector.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the connector to be fetched.

200.description: A JSON response containing the details of the connector.

404.description: The connector could not be found.

put.description: Endpoint to update a connector. If the update operation was successful, it returns the connection verification status for the updated connector.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the connector to be updated.

200.description: A JSON response containing the connection verification status of the updated connector.

400.description: If the request data is invalid, it returns a 400 status with an error message.

404.description: If the connector is not found, it returns a 404 status with an error message.

post.description: Endpoint to upload a file to the server.

200.description: A JSON response containing the details of the uploaded file.

post.description: Endpoint to create and get alerts. Retrieves all available alerts from the AlertsService based on the provided parameters.

size.description: The number of alerts to return. Defaults to 10.

timerange.description: The time range to consider for alerts. Defaults to '24h'.

alert_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'syslog_level'.

alert_value.description: Value to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'ALERT'.

timestamp_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to '@timestamp'.

post.summary: Create and get alerts from a specific agent
post.description: Endpoint to create and get alerts from a specific agent. Retrieves all available alerts from the AlertsService based on the provided parameters.

agent_name.description: The name of the host to get alerts from.

size.description: The number of alerts to return. Defaults to 10.

timerange.description: The time range to consider for alerts. Defaults to '24h'.

alert_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'syslog_level'.

alert_value.description: Value to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'ALERT'.

timestamp_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to '@timestamp'.

post.summary: Create and get alerts from an index
post.description: Endpoint to create and get alerts from an index. Retrieves all available alerts from the AlertsService based on the provided parameters.

index_name.description: The name of the index to get alerts from.

size.description: The number of alerts to return. Defaults to 10.

timerange.description: The time range to consider for alerts. Defaults to '24h'.

alert_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'syslog_level'.

alert_value.description: Value to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'ALERT'.

timestamp_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to '@timestamp'.

post.summary: Create and get hosts with alerts
post.description: Endpoint to create and get hosts with alerts. Retrieves all available hosts from the AlertsService based on the provided parameters.

timerange.description: The time range to consider for alerts. Defaults to '24h'.

alert_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'syslog_level'.

alert_value.description: Value to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'ALERT'.

timestamp_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to '@timestamp'.

post.summary: Create and get rules with alerts
post.description: Endpoint to create and get rules with alerts. Retrieves all available rules from the AlertsService based on the provided parameters.

timerange.description: The time range to consider for alerts. Defaults to '24h'.

alert_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'syslog_level'.

alert_value.description: Value to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'ALERT'.

timestamp_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to '@timestamp'.

post.summary: Create and get rules with alerts per host
post.description: Endpoint to create and get rules with alerts per host. Retrieves all available rules from the AlertsService based on the provided parameters and organizes them by host.

alert_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'syslog_level'.

alert_value.description: Value to filter alerts on. Defaults to 'ALERT'.

timestamp_field.description: Field to filter alerts on. Defaults to '@timestamp'.
